name: Star Bowls
overview: Everyone in the insane asylum knew that Bowls was not as crazy as he looked. Years ago, his heroism He had saved the nation from a nuclear disaster. However, because of that frantic adventure, his mental health had been somewhat deteriorated. One morning, two guys dressed in Special Forces suits came to the clinic carrying an order to take Bowls with him. The disaster had occurred again, but this time its mission would not have the Earth as destiny ...
